articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: Microsoft adds quantum-resistant algorithms to its core crypto library - Ars Technica
articles.description: Two algorithms added so far, two more planned in the coming months.
articles.content:
8
Microsoft has updated a key cryptographic library with two new encryption algorithms designed to withstand attacks from quantum computers.
The updates were made last week to SymCrypt, a core cryp… [+5823 chars]
